summary: This is a simple mod to allow you to summon a boneyard keeper from the soul cairn
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/lxOCfOQ.png[/img]
Hi all And welcome to my very first mod. in this mod i have created spelltomes to allow you to summon a keeper from the soul carn. their is now 4 versions of this mod. and they are as follows:

Spell Version = This Is The Default Version You Can summon a random keeper for 60 seconds

Lesser Power Version = Same As Spell Version Except You Can Summon Via Lesser Power (Summon Regardless Of Conjuration level)

Leveled Version = The Higher Level You Are The Longer The Summoned Keeper Lasts

And now You can summon a keeper permanently. the keeper will last exactly 999 days. this is for those that would like the keeper as a companion. and is aimed at high level play.

Example:

This below applies to the level with player version of this mod:
Â 
Player Level 10 - Summoned Keeper 60 Seconds
Player Level 20 - Summoned Keeper 70 Seconds
Player Level 30 - Summoned Keeper 80 Seconds
Etc Etc

[img]http://i.imgur.com/LnHhCqU.png[/img]
the spelltome can be found in the reapers lair (Soul Cairn)

if you cannot find the reapers lair. open your console and type the following without quotation marks = "Coc DLC1SoulCairnReaperCell"

This will teleport you inside the reaper lair. where your new spell tomes will be waiting

i have included images with this file so you know what you will be looking for

[img]http://i.imgur.com/ImHwRTF.png[/img]
Skyrim
Dawngaurd

[img]http://i.imgur.com/DWi69B7.png[/img]
Bethesda For Skyrim, Creation Kit, Dawnguard
And You for Checking out my mod

Thank you for checking out my mod. if you have any feedback feel free to leave me some in the posts section :)
author: TwistedFatal

files.name: Summon Random Keeper - Spell Version
files.changelogHtml:
Added A Conjure Random Keeper - Spell Version
Added A Conjure Random Keeper - Lesser Power Version
Added A Conjure Random Keeper - Leveled Version
Added The Spell Tomes In The Reapers Lair (Soul Cairn)
Added A Banish Summon Spell Located In The Reapers Lair (Soul Cairn) - (Banish Spell Tome Only Exists In Lesser Power Version)
